title: TCS InQuizitive: Watch Quiz Videos of Students and Quizmaster
description: TCS InQuizitive videos show how students performed in the quarter, semifinal, and national final rounds. Watch all the school quiz competition videos here.

title: TCS and British Council Collaborate to Improve Digital Skills
description: This partnership aims to reach over 20,000 young people across the UK, providing them with the tools they need to succeed in a digital world.

title: Harnessing AI for Sustainable Global Supply Chains
description: A new research report exploring how artificial intelligence can be used to optimize logistics while reducing carbon footprints.

title: TCS Named as a Leader in the Everest Group Life Sciences
description: The report highlights TCS' focus on building comprehensive solutions for the life sciences industry, leveraging its strong domain expertise.

title: Digital Transformation in Sports: The TCS Way
description: Discover how TCS is revolutionizing the sports experience through technology and sponsorship across major marathons.

title: Cybersecurity Trends for 2024: Staying Ahead of Threats
description: Experts at TCS share their top predictions and strategies for protecting enterprise data in an increasingly complex threat landscape.
